content: these were designed in response to a request for some christmas ornaments of a domestic nature they have been designed with a neck loop so as to hang on a tree materials 8 ply worsted weight 4mm hook makes an apron approx 12cm /5 inches from the top of the bib to the bottom of the skirt 4ply size 10 thread and a 2mm hook makes and apron approx 9cm /3 1/2 inches from the top of the bib to the bottom of the skirt pattern instructions included for 2 varieties pretty polly and plain jane
